1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Rops and cops.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Cop.Bundle
6  ( baalaCops,
7    baalaInfix,
8  ) where
9
10import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base       as B
11import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data       as D
12import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Cop.Arith  as Cop
13import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Cop.List   as Cop
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Cop.Logic  as Cop
15import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Cop.Misc   as Cop
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Cop.Order  as Cop
17import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Cop.Text   as Cop
18import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Cop.Time   as Cop
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Cop.Type   as Cop
20
21-- | Term-content operators.
22baalaCops :: (D.CContent c) => [D.Cop c]
23baalaCops = concat [ Cop.copsArith
24                   , Cop.copsLogic
25                   , Cop.copsList
26                   , Cop.copsMisc
27                   , Cop.copsOrder
28                   , Cop.copsText
29                   , Cop.copsTime
30                   , Cop.copsType ]
31
32-- | Height table.
33baalaInfix :: [B.Named B.InfixHeight]
34baalaInfix = htab where
35    h # name = (name, Left h)
36    h ! name = (name, Right h)
37
38    htab =
39        [ 9 ! "then"
40        , 9 ! "when"
41        , 9 ! "unless"
42        , 9 ! "is"
43        , 9 # "of"
44        , 9 ! "to"
45
46        , 8 ! "or"
47
48        , 7 ! "and"
49
50        , 6 ! "in"
51        , 6 ! "="     -- equal
52        , 6 ! "<>"    -- not equal
53        , 6 ! "<"     -- less than
54        , 6 ! ">"     -- greater than
55        , 6 ! "<="    -- less than or equal
56        , 6 ! ">="    -- greater than or equal
57        , 6 ! "=*"    -- begin with
58        , 6 ! "*="    -- end with
59        , 6 ! "*=*"   -- contain
60
61        , 2 ! "+"     -- add
62        , 2 ! ".+"    -- left add
63        , 2 ! "+."    -- right add
64        , 2 ! ".+."   -- strict add
65
66        , 2 ! "-"     -- sub
67        , 2 ! ".-"    -- left sub
68        , 2 ! "-."    -- right sub
69        , 2 ! ".-."   -- strict sub
70
71        , 2 ! "++"
72        , 2 ! "intersect"
73        , 2 ! "minus"
74
75        , 1 ! "*"
76        , 1 ! "div"
77        , 1 ! "quo"
78        , 1 ! "rem"
79
80        , ("<left-1>"  , Left 1)
81        , ("<right-1>" , Right 1)
82        ]
83
